summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a link to an article about Bear Stearns. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended for the recipient only.

The email includes a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
